function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on non-capital cities and small cities in policy and research agendas","Impact":"Greater challenges for non-capital and small cities in addressing contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate tailored policies and research agendas for non-capital and small cities","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data analytics for resource allocation","People":"Residents of non-capital and small cities","Owner":"Government authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of interdisciplinary personnel and networks in public services governance","Impact":"Limited sharing of best practices and interdisciplinary knowledge","Mitigation":"Promote interdisciplinary training and networking for public service personnel","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, knowledge management systems","People":"Public service personnel","Owner":"Government agencies, training institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of training in ecosystems and environmental issues for top management in public services","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of green spaces and environmental issues in urban policy","Mitigation":"Provide training in ecology and environmental economics for top management","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, virtual workshops","People":"Top management in public services","Owner":"Government agencies, educational institutions"}]}
